title: Cardi B shows off the results of her boob job and lipo as she twerks in tiny G-string bikini
text:

Cardi B has flaunted the results of her surgery in a new Instagram upload.

The rapper, 27, wore a tiny G-string bikini by Louis Vuitton.

She teamed it with gold jewellery and white heels as she posed seductively next to a swimming pool with her finger in her mouth.

She captioned the snap: "Make it leak".

In her Instagram story, the star also posted videos of her twerking in the pool, showing off her famous derriere.

(Image: Cardi B/Instagram)

Cardi underwent a breast augmentation and liposuction earlier this year, after she gave birth to baby Kulture.

But her surgery left her with complications and she had to cancel her upcoming performances.

“My doctor was like, ‘Yo, you cannot be doing all these shows because you’re not fully healed and I keep telling you this and then if something happens to you, you gonna to try to blame me,” Cardi said via Instagram at the time.

(Image: iamcardib/Instagram)

She said flying to shows made her body 'swell up', adding that the cancellations had cost her 'millions of dollars'.

She shared a photo of her feet resting up on a counter with strap marks all over her feet.

“Look how swollen my feet get every time I take flights my stomach gets even more puffy,” she wrote on the painful image.

(Image: iamcardib/Instagram)

Cardi B's rep confirmed to Mirror Online in a statement: "Cardi was overzealous in getting back to work, she didn't take the time necessary to fully recover from her surgery.

"Her strenuous schedule has taken a toll on her body and she has been given strict doctors orders to pull out of the rest of her performances in May."

Cardi B has been very candid about her surgery and told E! News previously: "I don't like lying about things.

(Image: Twitter)

"Like when you see somebody that had lipo you think that they just go into the doctor's and like boop, you come out and you look amazing, but it's actually like a very long process, recovery.

"It actually takes like a little bit more than three or four months."

Speaking about what she was looking to achieve by having the surgery, Cardi said: "I've always had abs.

"I'm a very skinny person so when they taking extra fat out and your skin is tightening more, it's like my bones are actually showing more."
description: The rapper showcased her incredible body after cosmetic enhancements which forced her to cancel several shows
